import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Login.scss"; import * as Yup from "yup"; import { Formik, Form, Field, ErrorMessage } from "formik"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { MDBAnimation, MDBModal, MDBModalBody, MDBModalHeader } from "mdbreact"; import ResetPass from "../ResetPass/ResetPass"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import {} from "../../../redux/actions/redux-token-auth-config"; const initialValues = { email: "", password: "", }; const onSubmit = (values) => { console.log(values); }; const validationSchema = Yup.object().shape({ email: Yup.string().email("Invalid email").required("Required"), password: Yup.string() .min(6, "Too Short!") .max(50, "Too Long!") .required("Required"), }); function Login(props) { // const [bColor, setbColor] = useState("black"); const [state, setstate] = useState({ modal8: false, modal9: false, }); function toggle(nr) { let modalNumber = "modal" + nr; setstate({ [modalNumber]: !state[modalNumber], }); } return (
{ toggle(8); }} fullHeight position="right" > { toggle(8); }} >
